testcase.classname: To add and verify Virtual Portfolio validation on sharekhan's website
testcase.name: Verify user is able to Add Virtual Portfolio
testcase.system-out: Given user is already logged in and is on Dashboard page....................passed When user clicks on Portfolio Option to ADD VIRTUAL PORTFOLIO option and enters the data in Portfolio folder.passed And user clicks on add scrip for adding the stock...........................passed Then user should able to see the added scrip in virtual portfolio successfully.passed
